statements: SELECT * FROM DeskBooking;
SELECT booking_id, desk_id, employee_id, booking_date, start_time, end_time FROM DeskBooking;
SELECT booking_id, desk_id, employee_id, booking_date FROM DeskBooking WHERE employee_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM DeskBooking WHERE booking_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT desk_id, employee_id, booking_date FROM DeskBooking WHERE desk_id = 5 ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM DeskBooking WHERE employee_id = 101 ORDER BY booking_date ASC, start_time DESC;
SELECT booking_id, desk_id, employee_id FROM DeskBooking WHERE desk_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND booking_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT booking_id, booking_date, start_time, end_time FROM DeskBooking WHERE employee_id = 103 AND (start_time < '10:00:00' OR end_time > '18:00:00');
SELECT desk_id, COUNT(*) AS total_bookings FROM DeskBooking GROUP BY desk_id HAVING total_bookings > 5 ORDER BY total_bookings DESC;
SELECT employee_id, AVG(end_time - start_time) AS avg_duration FROM DeskBooking GROUP BY employee_id HAVING AVG(end_time - start_time) > TIME '05:00:00';
SELECT * FROM desk_booking ORDER BY date_booked DESC, time_slot_start ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT desk_id, user_id, date_booked FROM desk_booking WHERE user_id = 123 AND date_booked >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT desk_id, user_id FROM desk_booking WHERE date_booked = '2022-02-15' AND time_slot_start BETWEEN '09:00:00' AND '12:00:00'
SELECT * FROM hot_desking WHERE available = TRUE ORDER BY last_used_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT desk_id, available FROM hot_desking WHERE desk_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT desk_id, user_id, date_booked FROM desk_booking WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY date_booked DESC, time_slot_start ASC;
SELECT desk_id, user_id, date_booked, time_slot_start, time_slot_end FROM desk_booking WHERE date_booked BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY desk_id;
SELECT desk_id, user_id, date_booked, time_slot_start FROM desk_booking WHERE user_id = 456 AND time_slot_start >= '09:00:00' ORDER BY time_slot_start;
SELECT desk_id, user_id, date_booked, time_slot_start, time_slot_end FROM desk_booking WHERE date_booked = '2022-03-15' AND time_slot_start < '14:00:00';
SELECT desk_id, available, last_used_date FROM hot_desking WHERE available = TRUE ORDER BY last_used_date DESC, desk_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM desk_booking WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT desk_id, booking_date, start_time, end_time FROM hot_desking WHERE booking_date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id FROM desk_booking;
SELECT desk_id, utilization_percentage FROM workspace_utilization ORDER BY utilization_percentage DESC;
SELECT desk_id, booking_date, start_time, end_time FROM hot_desking WHERE employee_id = 2 ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM desk_booking WHERE employee_id = 123 AND booking_date = '2023-05-12'
SELECT desk_id, booking_date FROM hot_desking WHERE start_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00'
SELECT desk_id, MAX(utilization_percentage) AS max_utilization FROM workspace_utilization GROUP BY desk_id
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(*) AS total_bookings FROM desk_booking WHERE booking_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31' GROUP BY employee_id
SELECT date(utilization_date) AS booking_day, AVG(utilization_percentage) AS avg_utilization FROM workspace_utilization GROUP BY date(utilization_date) ORDER BY avg_utilization DESC
SELECT * FROM DeskBooking;
SELECT employee_id, date, start_time, end_time FROM HotDesking;
SELECT desk_id, location FROM Desk ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM Employee WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT booking_id, desk_id, employee_id, date, start_time, end_time FROM DeskBooking WHERE date = '2022-12-01';
SELECT * FROM DeskBooking WHERE booking_id = 123;
SELECT employee_id, date, start_time, end_time FROM DeskBooking WHERE desk_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM Desk WHERE location = 'Floor 3';
SELECT employee_id, department FROM Employee WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT desk_id, employee_id, date FROM HotDesking ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT * FROM DeskBooking;
SELECT booking_id, desk_id, employee_id FROM DeskBooking ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
SELECT full_name, email FROM Employee WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT desk_id, desk_name FROM Desk WHERE is_hotdesk = TRUE;
SELECT department_name FROM Department WHERE department_name LIKE '%IT%';
SELECT * FROM DeskBooking WHERE employee_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT booking_date, start_time, end_time FROM DeskBooking WHERE desk_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440001' ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, SUM(end_time - start_time) AS total_booking_time FROM DeskBooking GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_booking_time > '02:00:00';
SELECT Desk.desk_name, HotDesking.is_available FROM Desk JOIN HotDesking ON Desk.desk_id = HotDesking.desk_id WHERE HotDesking.is_available = TRUE;
SELECT full_name, department_name FROM Employee JOIN Department ON Employee.department = Department.department_id ORDER BY full_name ASC, department_name DESC;
